SELECT sa.app_id AS appId, sa.app_code AS appCode, sa.app_name AS appName, sa.app_jump_address AS appJumpAddress, sa.app_type AS appType, sd.dict_name AS appTypeName FROM biemo_ent_user_account ua LEFT JOIN biemo_ent_comp_app ca ON ua.company_id = ca.company_id LEFT JOIN biemo_sys_app sa ON sa.app_id = ca.app_id INNER JOIN biemo_sys_dict sd ON sd.dict_id = sa.app_type WHERE sa.`status` = 1 AND ua.account_id = #{accountId} ORDER BY sa.order_no ASC,create_user DESC
